programme.title: Boys on the Side
Boys on the Side
programme.desc:
Boys on the Side: Directed by Herbert Ross. With Whoopi Goldberg, Mary-Louise Parker, Drew Barrymore, Matthew McConaughey. Robin shares a ride in her car with Jane from New York to Los Angeles. They stop at Jane's friend Holly's place in Pittsburgh and take her with them west, making a long stop in Tucson. The three very different women become close friends." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0112571/","name":"Boys on the Side","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDlhZGNiNmItODQ4NS00OTk3LWI2MDctMDZmODFjN2NlODExXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Robin shares a ride in her car with Jane from New York to Los Angeles. They stop at Jane's friend Holly's place in Pittsburgh and take her with them west, making a long stop in Tucson. The three very different women become close frie","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0112571/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"preppy-3"},"dateCreated":"2002-01-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great movie","reviewBody":"Great movie about three women (Whoppi Goldberg, Mary-Louise Parker, Drew Barrymore) and their various adventures as they travel cross-country. Goldberg plays a lesbian, Parker plays a straight woman with AIDS and Barrymore a pregnant, unwed woman. All three are fantastic and the film manages (more or less) to juggle many plot elements (AIDS, lesbianism, pregnancy, drugs, violence, murder etc etc) and deal with them all effectively.

Parker is probably the first woman ever to play a straight woman with AIDS in a major Hollywood film--quite a feat. Goldberg and Barrymore are just letter perfect in their roles. Also the unknown Matthew McConaughey (absolutely gorgeous with a buff body and blue eyes blazing) and Estelle Parsons (as Parker's mother) give strong supporting performances. The film is long but never dull and it all ends to a very moving final sequence--I cry every time I see it!

Two minor quibbles--it takes Barrymore over a year to have her baby and there are obvious cuts in the second half of the movie (I assume this was to keep the film down to two hours). But these are minor problems. A very funny, very moving film. Don't miss it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12655,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"1995-02-03","keywords":"lesbian,female protagonist,terminal illness,domestic violence,abusive boyfriend","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Boys On The Side","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3552248089","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTliMjZiNGItMjg0Ny00YjE2LWJkOTktMWJhMzJiNzA4M2ExXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTliMjZiNGItMjg0Ny00YjE2LWJkOTktMWJhMzJiNzA4M2ExXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Warner Bros. Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000155/","name":"Whoopi Goldberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000571/","name":"Mary-Louise Parker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000106/","name":"Drew Barrymore"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006889/","name":"Herbert Ross"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0021159/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0004452/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0740400/","name":"Don Roos"}],"duration":"PT1H55M"}</script><metacontent="

The three very different women become close friends." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0112571/","name":"Boys on the Side","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDlhZGNiNmItODQ4NS00OTk3LWI2MDctMDZmODFjN2NlODExXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Robin shares a ride in her car with Jane from New York to Los Angeles. The three very different women become close frie","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0112571/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"preppy-3","dateCreated":"2002-01-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great movie","reviewBody":"Great movie about three women (Whoppi Goldberg, Mary-Louise Parker, Drew Barrymore) and their various adventures as they travel cross-country. Goldberg plays a lesbian, Parker plays a straight woman with AIDS and Barrymore a pregnant, unwed woman. All three are fantastic and the film manages (more or less) to juggle many plot elements (AIDS, lesbianism, pregnancy, drugs, violence, murder etc etc) and deal with them all effectively.

Parker is probably the first woman ever to play a straight woman with AIDS in a major Hollywood film--quite a feat. Goldberg and Barrymore are just letter perfect in their roles. Also the unknown Matthew McConaughey (absolutely gorgeous with a buff body and blue eyes blazing) and Estelle Parsons (as Parker's mother) give strong supporting performances. The film is long but never dull and it all ends to a very moving final sequence--I cry every time I see it!

Two minor quibbles--it takes Barrymore over a year to have her baby and there are obvious cuts in the second half of the movie (I assume this was to keep the film down to two hours). But these are minor problems. A very funny, very moving film. Don't miss it!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12655,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"1995-02-03","keywords":"lesbian,female protagonist,terminal illness,domestic violence,abusive boyfriend","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Boys On The Side","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3552248089","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTliMjZiNGItMjg0Ny00YjE2LWJkOTktMWJhMzJiNzA4M2ExXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTliMjZiNGItMjg0Ny00YjE2LWJkOTktMWJhMzJiNzA4M2ExXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Warner Bros. programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
Transformersi 2: Osveta poraženih
programme.desc: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen: Directed by Michael Bay. With Shia LaBeouf, Megan Fox, Josh Duhamel, Tyrese Gibson. Sam Witwicky leaves the Autobots behind for a normal life. But when his mind is filled with cryptic symbols, the Decepticons target him and he is dragged back into the Transformers' war." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1055369/","name":"Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjk4OTczOTk0NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjQ0NzMzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Sam Witwicky leaves the Autobots behind for a normal life. But when his mind is filled with cryptic symbols, the Decepticons target him and he is dragged back into the Transformers' war.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1055369/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Thanos_Alfie"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not bad...","reviewBody":""Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen" is an Action - Sci-Fi movie and the sequel of "Transformers", in which we watch Sam leaving Autobots and his previous life behind him in order to be another ordinary teenager. Soon he will realize that something strange is happening since his mind is full of cryptic symbols and the Decepticons are after him.\n\nI liked this movie because it had an interesting plot and it was a good continuation of the first movie of Transformers but it was not as good as the first one. The direction which was made for one more time by Michael Bay was good and he had mostly the same style as in the first movie. Finally, I have to say that "Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen" is not a bad sequel but it could be better with some changes and some additional information that could make it more interesting.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":396337,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2009-06-23","keywords":"optimus prime character,megatron character,toaster,ratchet character,evil robot","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen -- Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2982019609","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA3MzU3MzgxNTZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQ2MDY3MzMx._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA3MzU3MzgxNTZeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDQ2MDY3MzMx._V1_.jpg","description":"Decepticon forces return to Earth on a mission to take Sam Witwicky prisoner, after the young hero learns the truth about the ancient origins of the Transformers."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0479471/","name":"Shia LaBeouf"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1083271/","name":"Megan Fox"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0241049/","name":"Josh Duhamel"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000881/","name":"Michael Bay"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0238206/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0472567/","name":"Ehren Kruger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0649460/","name":"Roberto Orci"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0476064/","name":"Alex Kurtzman"}],"duration":"PT2H29M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Gothika
Gotika
programme.desc:
Gothika: Directed by Mathieu Kassovitz. With Halle Berry, Robert Downey Jr., Charles S. Dutton, John Carroll Lynch. A depressed psychiatrist wakes up as a patient in the asylum where she worked, with no memory of why she is there or what she has done." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0348836/","name":"Gothika","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxNDA4OTAxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTI5NjQzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A depressed psychiatrist wakes up as a patient in the asylum where she worked, with no memory of why she is there or what she has done.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0348836/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mjw2305"},"dateCreated":"2007-01-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pschologically creepy, but a little flawed","reviewBody":"Halle Berry plays brilliant criminal psychologist, Dr. Miranda Grey; an expert in what is rational, logical and sane. After she encounters a mysterious young girl, she finds herself confined to the institute in which she once worked; along side the patients she once treated. She has to rationalise what is real in her own mind, before she loses it forever.

The setting and atmosphere that is created in Gothika is excellent, and the movie is definitely creepy enough to jangle your nerves. Halle Berry, Penelope Cruz and Robert Downey Jnr all fit into their roles nicely; the problem is plain and simple. The storyline and script are too weak to achieve what this movie sets out to do, and because of some lame dialogue and a flawed plot the movie only manages to be decent; when it really should have been great.

6/10 It's still worth watching.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":110822,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2004-03-03","keywords":"psychiatrist,serial rape,mental hospital,murder of husband,rape","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Gothika","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3819569433","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTY4NjEzNTYtY2Q2My00Y2ZmLTg0MDgtNjYzMGUxZDliNWMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTY4NjEzNTYtY2Q2My00Y2ZmLTg0MDgtNjYzMGUxZDliNWMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"hv-post"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000932/","name":"Halle Berry"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004851/","name":"Penélope Cruz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000375/","name":"Robert Downey Jr."}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0440913/","name":"Mathieu Kassovitz"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050870/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0349406/","name":"Sebastian Gutierrez"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0348836, Title: Gothika, --- Description: Gothika: Directed by Mathieu Kassovitz. With Halle Berry, Robert Downey Jr., Charles S. Dutton, John Carroll Lynch. A depressed psychiatrist wakes up as a patient in the asylum where she worked, with no memory of why she is there or what she has done." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0348836/","name":"Gothika","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxNDA4OTAxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTI5NjQzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A depressed psychiatrist wakes up as a patient in the asylum where she worked, with no memory of why she is there or what she has done.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0348836/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"mjw2305","dateCreated":"2007-01-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pschologically creepy, but a little flawed","reviewBody":"Halle Berry plays brilliant criminal psychologist, Dr. Miranda Grey; an expert in what is rational, logical and sane. After she encounters a mysterious young girl, she finds herself confined to the institute in which she once worked; along side the patients she once treated. She has to rationalise what is real in her own mind, before she loses it forever.

The setting and atmosphere that is created in Gothika is excellent, and the movie is definitely creepy enough to jangle your nerves. Halle Berry, Penelope Cruz and Robert Downey Jnr all fit into their roles nicely; the problem is plain and simple. The storyline and script are too weak to achieve what this movie sets out to do, and because of some lame dialogue and a flawed plot the movie only manages to be decent; when it really should have been great.

6/10 It's still worth watching.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":110822,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2004-03-03","keywords":"psychiatrist,serial rape,mental hospital,murder of husband,rape","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Gothika","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3819569433","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTY4NjEzNTYtY2Q2My00Y2ZmLTg0MDgtNjYzMGUxZDliNWMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTY4NjEzNTYtY2Q2My00Y2ZmLTg0MDgtNjYzMGUxZDliNWMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"hv-post","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000932/","name":"Halle Berry","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004851/","name":"Penélope Cruz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000375/","name":"Robert Downey Jr."],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0440913/","name":"Mathieu Kassovitz"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050870/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0349406/","name":"Sebastian Gutierrez"],"duration":"PT1H38M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
Tajna podmornice K-19
programme.desc:
K-19: The Widowmaker: Directed by Kathryn Bigelow. With Sam Spruell, Peter Stebbings, Christian Camargo, Roman Podhora. When Russia's first nuclear submarine malfunctions on its maiden voyage, the crew must race to save the ship and prevent a nuclear disaster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0267626/","name":"K-19: The Widowmaker","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWY2YjIwNDAtYjQwOC00YjY5LTk2MDUtMjY4ZDdiMjdlNjIzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"When Russia's first nuclear submarine malfunctions on its maiden voyage, the crew must race to save the ship and prevent a nuclear disaster.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0267626/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Anonymous_Maxine"},"dateCreated":"2008-05-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's frightening how close we came...","reviewBody":"K-19 has a massive cast, especially in the two lead characters of Mikhail Polenin (Liam Neeson) and Alexei Vostrikov (Harrison Ford). My understanding is that Ford wanted to take on a role different than ones he had taken in the past to prevent type-casting, and while he does a good job in his role (as does just about everyone involved), the movie does slip up a little bit by having an almost nonexistent Russian presence in what is supposed to be the story of a Russian submarine.

Comparisons to the far superior Hunt for Red October are inevitable, and it is interesting to note that that movie was also about a Russian submarine but was presented all in English, but it doesn't lose credibility the way K-19 does, probably because it at least maintained a Russian accent, while Ford is speaking an unmistakable American accent and Neeson, well, Neeson is just Neeson and that's always good. He makes a great German but is less convincing as a Russian. I don't know why.

Nevertheless, as a story about an extremely important submarine mission rife with problems the movie succeeds brilliantly. K-19 is basically Russia's protection again nuclear war, which they fear the Americans might start at any moment. They hope to deter attack by showing evidence that they can issue destruction in return, and it is because of this that the sub is commissioned and sent on a mission to the polar ice caps to launch a test missile. There is a great scene where all of the crew and many other people are witnessing the launch of the submarine, and a woman swings a bottle of champagne on a rope to smash against the hull, but it bounces off unbroken. "We're cursed," one of the dismayed crewmen says. That woman must have felt terrible.

There is an immediate rivalry between Polenin, who understands the ship's limitations and wants them corrected before beginning the mission, and Vostrikov, who also understands the ship's limitations but also understands how important the mission is and so outranks Polenin's protests. One of the best things about the movie is that the dramatic action is pushed along by genuine concerns. The movie would have suffered terribly if they were ignoring such important problems with the submarine without good reason.

One of the best things about the movie is that it is able to create so much dramatic tension, even though it takes place during peacetime. There was a huge amount of political tension in the air, but there wasn't a war going on. This is why there is not a lot of concern shown when an American destroyer is sighted near the submarine, because one of the goals of the mission is for the Americans to see what they're doing.

Instead, a small leak aboard the nuclear sub becomes a problem big enough to potentially start a war. Incidentally, one of the crewmen noticed something wrong with one of the dials at least twice before the leak was discovered (once before the ship left port). Had he reported that problem when he first noticed it, he could have saved the lives of everyone who died because of the radiation and prevented the entire thing. At any rate, once the leak is discovered, the options are to abandon ship and surrender the crucial technology to the Americans (a single concession which could dramatically alter the futures of the two nations, and thus rendering it unacceptable), try to repair the reactor without sufficient protection against the radiation, or scuttle the ship (also unacceptable because of the boat's importance).

There is a tense scene where Vostikov orders the ship to dive to almost crush depth, one of the obligatory scenes in submarine movies where the hull creaks and groans and everyone stares at the ceiling, like there's something to see there, and then he orders the ship to ascend at breakneck speed, surfacing through a layer of ice. Vostrikov intends to push the boat and the men to the limit so that they all know what the limit is, but unfortunately it culminates in a hugely disappointing display of digital effects as the ship breaks through the ice in something that looks more like it belongs in a cartoon than a serious film like this (I was reminded of the unfortunate Scrat's efforts to save an acorn from a splitting glacier in Ice Age).

The film requires an extra bit of suspension of disbelief to accept a story about a Russian submarine but without any Russian actors. I'm curious to know how it was received in Russia. I imagine it was a hit, despite the lack of Russian presence in the film, because it illustrates their courage and dedication to their country in the most difficult of times. But nonetheless, it is hugely effective and never lets up once it gets going. The ending strikes me as the part where the most creative liberties were taken with the original true story, leaving you with the feeling of a Hollywood ending imposed on a true story from Russian and American history. But if nothing else, the movie is a fascinating look at how close we came to widespread destruction during one of the most tense times in modern history.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":61869,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","History","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-12-25","keywords":"radiation sickness,radioactive contamination,soviet union,submarine,nuclear submarine","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"K-19: The Widowmaker","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4153606425","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmQ4NTRhMmEtZTBhNS00NTQ5LWI5YTktYWUyZmU3ZDg4OTIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmQ4NTRhMmEtZTBhNS00NTQ5LWI5YTktYWUyZmU3ZDg4OTIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for K-19: The Widowmaker"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000148/","name":"Harrison Ford"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0819874/","name":"Sam Spruell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0824220/","name":"Peter Stebbings"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000941/","name":"Kathryn Bigelow"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0029472/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019266/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010183/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0637491/","name":"Louis Nowra"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0477370/","name":"Christopher Kyle"}],"duration":"PT2H18M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
Transformersi 3: Tamna strana Mjeseca
programme.desc:
Transformers: Dark of the Moon: Directed by Michael Bay. With Shia LaBeouf, Rosie Huntington-Whiteley, Josh Duhamel, John Turturro. The Autobots learn of a Cybertronian spacecraft hidden on the moon, and race against the Decepticons to reach it and to learn its secrets." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1399103/","name":"Transformers: Dark of the Moon","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwOTY0MTc1NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDQwNjA2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Autobots learn of a Cybertronian spacecraft hidden on the moon, and race against the Decepticons to reach it and to learn its secrets.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1399103/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gavin-thelordofthefu-48-460297"},"dateCreated":"2013-11-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"A bit of an improvement over ROTF, but not nearly as good as the first","reviewBody":"In order to coincide with a fourth Transformers coming out in the next few months, I'll be reviewing this third entry of the successful film series. I liked the first Transformers despite it's cheesy dialog in some parts and while there were some awkward moments and very bad dialog, I still liked Revenge of the Fallen. Then, when I saw the whole thing in theaters back at 2011, I thought, this wasn't so bad after all. It later turned out to be a good ride, but while I do think it's a bit of an improvement over the previous film, it's nowhere near as good as the first.

First, there are some good things that saved the film for me. The music score from Steve Jablonsky has improved and has an epic tone to it. The story is a lot more decent than the previous film with a much better second and third halves; the action sequences are solid especially the collapsing building scene which took my very breath away. The scenery is great and the special effects are as top-notch as ever. The acting is good, too. While John Turturo, Franches McDormand, and John Malkovich aren't given much to do, they did fine with the material. Patrick Dempsey did OK as the villain, but he's a bit underwhelming. Rosie Hunter Whiteley is a bit bland, but not exactly terrible as the new girlfriend for Sam Witwicky. While Shia LeBeouf isn't as charismatic as he was in the first film, he does have the same charm he brought to the film series so far. The Autobots and Decepticons are great to see again and the voice actors are solid especially Leonard Nimoy as Sentinal Prime, who is a very good villain for the movie much Megatron.

Then, there are the bad things that I would point out. First, the script. While the second and third halves are a lot better, the first half is pretty boring. It seems to be lacking in it's action and it wasn't exciting. Second, the ending is way too similar to the first Transformers (what? with the auto-bots and decepticons fight against each other while bringing destruction to the city and such?) The pacing is also very sluggish it would almost put you to sleep. Third and mostly the final problem is the dialog. There are some humorous bits that might get the audience a chuckle, but there are other parts that are just so inane it would give you a headache.

Overall, Transformers: DOTM isn't nearly as good as the first, but despite the flaws that I just stated, I think this is a great sequel in an overall solid franchise. I may not be a fan of Michael Bay and such, but while I do not like the Bad Boys films, Pearl Harbor, and others, I think that this and the other films are a lot better and it deserves a recommendation to those who haven't seen it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":395947,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2011-06-29","keywords":"job interview,year 1969,optimus prime character,robert f. kennedy character,megatron character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi543989017","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYyOTgwOTExOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDQ0NzcyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYyOTgwOTExOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDQ0NzcyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Autobots learn of a Cybertronian spacecraft hidden on the Moon, and race against the Decepticons to reach it and learn its secrets, which could turn the tide in the Transformers' final battle."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0479471/","name":"Shia LaBeouf"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2492819/","name":"Rosie Huntington-Whiteley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0879085/","name":"Tyrese Gibson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000881/","name":"Michael Bay"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040938/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0130376/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0472567/","name":"Ehren Kruger"}],"duration":"PT2H34M"}</script><metacontent="

There are some humorous bits that might get the audience a chuckle, but there are other parts that are just so inane it would give you a headache.

Overall, Transformers: DOTM isn't nearly as good as the first, but despite the flaws that I just stated, I think this is a great sequel in an overall solid franchise. I may not be a fan of Michael Bay and such, but while I do not like the Bad Boys films, Pearl Harbor, and others, I think that this and the other films are a lot better and it deserves a recommendation to those who haven't seen it.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":395947,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2011-06-29","keywords":"job interview,year 1969,optimus prime character,robert f. kennedy character,megatron character","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi543989017","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYyOTgwOTExOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDQ0NzcyMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYyOTgwOTExOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDQ0NzcyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Autobots learn of a Cybertronian spacecraft hidden on the Moon, and race against the Decepticons to reach it and learn its secrets, which could turn the tide in the Transformers' final battle.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0479471/","name":"Shia LaBeouf","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2492819/","name":"Rosie Huntington-Whiteley","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0879085/","name":"Tyrese Gibson"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000881/","name":"Michael Bay"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040938/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0130376/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0472567/","name":"Ehren Kruger"],"duration":"PT2H34M"</script><metacontent="

credits.actor: Billy Ray Cyrus, Gina Holden, Emily Tennant, Matt Ward, Jacob Blair

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
Dnevnik Bridget Jones
programme.desc:
Bridget Jones's Diary: Directed by Sharon Maguire. With Renée Zellweger, Gemma Jones, Celia Imrie, James Faulkner. Bridget Jones is determined to improve herself while she looks for love in a year in which she keeps a personal diary." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0243155/","name":"Bridget Jones's Diary","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjc3NjU1ZTEtNmNjNi00YzNiLWI3OWQtMTJmYTRkZDc1NDE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Bridget Jones is determined to improve herself while she looks for love in a year in which she keeps a personal diary.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0243155/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kwongers"},"dateCreated":"2004-02-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Delightful, witty, and sexy  a TRIUMPH!","reviewBody":"As a huge fan of the books, I had incredibly high expectations of the movie. In order for the movie to work for me, it had to capture Bridget's plucky-heroine character and the hilarious-poignant emotions that are in the book. Needless to say, `Bridget Jones's Diary' the movie worked very, very, very well. Although Helen Fielding also wrote the screenplay (w/ Richard Curtis, very skilled with romantic comedies) and keeps the laughs coming, this movie could have fallen flat on its face. But it doesn't because one, the casting is absolutely divine and two, smartly builds on some elements the book downplays. 

	 Renee Zellweger is absolutely perfect as Bridget Jones. She has always been one of my favorite actresses and here, she totally displays Bridget's pathetic cuteness. Zellweger gained weight for this role, too, so she looks adorably plump. It's very, very hard to not fall in love with her the moment you see her at her family's Christmas party or drinking alone at home or listening to sad, Celine Dion music. (You have a heart of stone if you aren't moved to laughs or tears or pity for her.) I can't imagine anyone else playing Bridget Jones. Zellweger fits the role because she is very much normal and approachable we can relate to her. 

As Daniel Cleaver (her caddish Cassanova lover/boss), Hugh Grant is smoldering and hilarious. (Ok, I might be a little biased because I've been in love with him for ages and ages, but you can't deny he is a great comedic actor.) There's no trace of his stuttering that we saw (and I loved) in `Four Weddings and a Funeral' or `Sense and Sensibility.' Grant morphs effortlessly into a cad that we all love to hate and all love to love. Yes, it's a paradox, but that is what Grant brings to his role. He makes being `bad' look so sexy. You can't take your eyes off him; he brings his own humor to his role. It's lovely, smoldering, and incredibly sexy. 

 Colin Firth is also a delight to watch onscreen as Mark Darcy (I think I might be in love with him, too). He is also sexy and smoldering, but not in the same wild, fiery way as Daniel Cleaver. Firth brings a very cute sweetness to his role. I don't know if it is his adorable face or his hair or the way he dresses or just the fact that he is a major sex symbol, but you can't help but fall in love with him the MOMENT you see him onscreen. There is also one very beautiful moment where he tells Bridget, `I like you very much just the way you are.' It's incredibly romantic and, for me, ranks right up there with Tom Cruise's `You complete me' in `Jerry Maguire.' He also has rather explosive chemistry with Renee Zellweger, which is moving and sexy all at the same time. (And, of course, the author Helen Fielding used Colin Firth as the basis for Mark Darcy, so it all works out marvelously.) 	

I also mentioned that the movie smartly builds on some elements that the book downplays. Yes, there are certain parts of the movie that cannot be found in the book, but I'm still glad they put them in the movie. Most of what they added doesn't necessarily build on plot but it does add to the characters. I don't want to give anything away because it's rather hilarious what unfolds onscreen. The movie is filmed in an almost Ally McBeal type of way but it remains true to the sincerity, cuteness, and pathetic naivete that Bridget Jones embodies. There are no pretensions. It's an entirely wonderful film. 10/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":235706,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2001-10-10","keywords":"unfaithfulness,employer employee relationship,opposites attract,love triangle,book publishing","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bridget Jones's Diary","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi192783897","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjg4ZGY2MWItNTJlYy00YTE1LTg2ZTAtZGIyNDEzYWYzZjNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjg4ZGY2MWItNTJlYy00YTE1LTg2ZTAtZGIyNDEzYWYzZjNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Bridget Jones's Diary"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000250/","name":"Renée Zellweger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000147/","name":"Colin Firth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000424/","name":"Hugh Grant"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0536632/","name":"Sharon Maguire"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0276144/","name":"Helen Fielding"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0203577/","name":"Andrew Davies"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0193485/","name":"Richard Curtis"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dante's Peak
Danteov vrh
programme.desc: Dante's Peak: Directed by Roger Donaldson. With Pierce Brosnan, Linda Hamilton, Jamie Renée Smith, Jeremy Foley. A vulcanologist arrives at a countryside town recently named the second most desirable place to live in America, and discovers that the long dormant volcano, Dante's Peak, may wake up at any moment." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0118928/","name":"Dante's Peak","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA1MWM3Y2MtM2YyMS00ZGI1LTgwMGQtMzczYjA5ZThmZTQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDk3NzU2MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A vulcanologist arrives at a countryside town recently named the second most desirable place to live in America, and discovers that the long dormant volcano, Dante's Peak, may wake up at any moment.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0118928/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"whpratt1"},"dateCreated":"2006-01-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pierce & Linda Gave a Great Performance","reviewBody":"Decided to view this picture only because Pierce Brosnan was starring in the film and greatly enjoyed his acting skills besides his appearing as James Bond. Pierce Brosnan,(Harry Dalton),"The Matador",'05, has a bad experience with the death of his wife during a volcano eruption and stayed in his profession as a geologist. Harry discovers from his charts that their could very well be another volcano problem effecting a small popular town. Linda Hamilton,(Rachel Wando),"The Kid & I ",'05 is the mayor and store owner of this town, who has a boy and a girl and is divorced. A romantic spark happens between Linda and Harry and the story develops into a monster of a tale. There is plenty of good action and it really keeps you on the edge of your seats. Pierce & Linda gave outstanding performances and the photography was great through out the entire picture. Very Entertaining","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":87350,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1997-02-07","keywords":"volcano,mayor,lava,volcanologist,volcanic eruption","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Dante's Peak","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2745172249","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDg0MTc4NGEtNjcwYy00ODgwLWEyNWEtMDE3NmI3MWZkZDJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDg0MTc4NGEtNjcwYy00ODgwLWEyNWEtMDE3NmI3MWZkZDJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000112/","name":"Pierce Brosnan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000157/","name":"Linda Hamilton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0808603/","name":"Jamie Renée Smith"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002044/","name":"Roger Donaldson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0092551/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092018/","name":"Leslie Bohem"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Na paranormalnom zadatku
programme.desc: Svi, pa tako i kapetanica LaFrey, iznenađeni su i zbunjeni kad Podzemna agencija dobije novog kapetana, Merva Minettea. Čini se da ni Minette nije oduševljen svojim novim položajem i zaustavlja Maxovu... Svi, pa tako i kapetanica LaFrey, iznenađeni su i zbunjeni kad Podzemna agencija dobije novog kapetana, Merva Minettea. Čini se da ni Minette nije oduševljen svojim novim položajem i zaustavlja Maxovu i Leroyevu istragu sumnjive žice.

programme.title: Na paranormalnom zadatku
programme.desc: Leroy dovodi vidovnjaka da otkrije tko je prisluškivao Ured. Iako on i ostatak ekipe odluči vjerovati otkrićima i poduzeti nešto kako bi vratili ured od Merva, Max odbija vjerovati u praznovjerja. Humoristična serija o partnerstvu dviju potpuno različitih osoba: ciničnog skeptika i genijalca koji vjeruje u paranormalno. Oni istražuju neobjašnjive događaje u Los Angelesu, a u isto vrijeme otkrivaju još veći misterij.

programme.title: Runner Runner
Enderova igra
programme.desc: Runner Runner: Directed by Brad Furman. With Justin Timberlake, Ben Affleck, Gemma Arterton, Anthony Mackie. When a poor college student who cracks an online poker game goes bust, he arranges a face-to-face with the man he thinks cheated him, a sly offshore entrepreneur." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2364841/","name":"Runner Runner","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzVlOGZmNDAtY2MxZi00NzE1LWI2NTYtZTU2Yjk3ODk0ZmQxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a poor college student who cracks an online poker game goes bust, he arranges a face-to-face with the man he thinks cheated him, a sly offshore entrepreneur.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2364841/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ThomDerd"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Saved by it's runtime of 90min and it's pace.","reviewBody":"I am neither a fan of Timberlake nor a fan of Batfleck, but I didn't hate them in this film. Acting is ok and the director did a smart thing and kept this movie short and with a good pace. Doesn't get boring and the story is ok especially if you are into gambling-style movies, but don't expect an intricate plot or smart twists. programme.title: Gladijator
programme.desc: Tommy Riley se s ocem tek doselio u Chicago. Školuje se, pazi na sebe, no, nakon jedne ulične borbe, primijete ga i ubrzo ulazi u svijet ilegalnog boksa u podzemlju, gdje udarci mogu ubiti. Tommy Riley se s ocem tek doselio u Chicago. Školuje se, pazi na sebe, no, nakon jedne ulične borbe, primijete ga i ubrzo ulazi u svijet ilegalnog boksa u podzemlju, gdje udarci mogu ubiti.

programme.title: Gjeneza
programme.desc: Viti 2067. Të mbijetuarit e ndotjes globale jetojnë nën tokë në kushte të ç'njerëzore, ndërsa janë rob të pushtetit. Një android krijohet për të ndihmuar me ndotjen, por ai që u ideua si shpresë e njërëzimit, tani, do t'i gjykojë ata.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Kryqi 3
programme.desc: Brian Austin Green, Danny Trejo. I armatosur më një hajmali të fuqishme në formën e një kryqi të lashtë, Callan rikthehet me një ekip të jashtëzakonshëm ekspertësh për të mbrojtur Los Anxhelosin nga kërcënimi më i madh që ka patur ndonjëherë.
programme.category: Aksion
fantazi

programme.title: Hardcore Misioni ekstrem
programme.desc: Sharlto Copley, Tim Roth, Andrei Dementiev. Një njeri zgjohet në një laborator të Moskës, ku është shndërruar në gjysmë robot dhe fillon një mision ekstrem për të shpëtuar bashkëshorten nga një njeri që kërkon të formojë një ushtri të pathyeshme.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: IO: E vetme në Tokë
programme.desc: Margaret Qualley, Anthony Mackie. Toka është bërë e pajetueshme. Njerëzimi është larguar, veç një shkencëtareje që beson se planeti mund të shpëtohet. Diçka ndryshon pasi ajo takon një burrë që nxiton drejt anijes së fundit që niset nga Toka...
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: I lindur për në ring
programme.desc: Steve Austin, Daniel Magder. Një ish boksier, i cili tashmë punon si pastrues në një shkollë, fillon të stërvisë një adoleshent për ndeshjen më të rëndësishme të jetës së tij...
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Lufta e yjeve II
programme.desc: Ndersa lufta e kloneve vazhdon, Anakin Skywalker dhe Obi-Wan Kenobi urdherohen te mbrojne Senatoren Padme' Amidala, jeta e se ciles eshte vene ne rrezik nga nje fraksion separatistesh politike te cilet duan ta asgjesojne...
programme.category: Sulmi i Kloneve

programme.title: Beteja për Vjenën
programme.desc: Në verën e vitit 1683, 300 mijë luftëtarë të perandorisë Otomane sulmuan Vjenën. Rënia e këtij qyteti do të hapte portat e Evropës. Kjo është historia e betejës vendimtare të 11 shtatorit të po atij viti.
programme.category: Aksion
epik

programme.title: Kodi i rinisë së përjetshme
programme.desc: Duke thyer çdo kod moral dhe etik, një kompani kërkimesh gjenetike zhvillon paisjen e lakmuar të rinisë së përhershme. Refuzimi i CEO-s për metodën e paligjshme, zbulon se shumë njerëz do të vrisnin pa druajte për të jetuar përgjithmonë...
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Njeriu i Tai Çisë
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves. Një njeri i pasur, i cili drejton dyluftime të jashtëligjshme rekruton një djalosh të talentuar në stilin Tai Çi. Por kur i riu joshet nga paraja dhe pushteti, atëherë do të nisë dhe lufta e vërtetë për mbijetesë...
programme.category: Aksion
arte marciale

programme.title: Në luftë me kohën
programme.desc: Dolph Lundgren, Natalie Burn. Një grua ka 24 orë kohë për të eliminuar kundërshtarët e një bosi të pamëshirshëm, ose rrezikon të humbasë të birin përgjithmonë. Por kur cënohet dashuria e një nënë, pasojat bëhen të paparashikueshme....
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Zemërdragoi 3: Mallkimi i magjistarit
programme.desc: Ben Kingsley. Një aspirant kalorës niset në kërkim të kometës prej ari, por në vend të saj gjen një dragua. Lidhja mes tyre bëhet e fortë kur dragoi i shpëton jetën djaloshit dhe të dy nisin luftën kundër mallkimit të magjistarit të lig.
programme.category: Aventurë
fantazi

programme.title: Operacioni Kondor
programme.desc: Bruce Willis, Kellan Lutz. Një ish-agjent i CIA-s rrëmbehet nga një grup terroristësh. Kur djali i tij mëson se agjencia nuk ka asnjë plan për të shpëtuar të atin, ai fillon operacionin e tij të shpëtimit.
programme.category: Aksion
aventurë

programme.title: Sulm në Uoll Strit
programme.desc: Dominic Purcell, Erin Karpluk. Kur ekonomia rrënohet dhe ai humbet gjithçka që kishte, një punonjës i makinave të blinduara të parave vendos të hakmerret kundër njerëzve të Uoll Stritit që i shkatërruan jetën..
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Legjenda e shpellës së arit
programme.desc: Një qiraxhi misterioz në fermën e një vejusheje, lidhet fort me djalin e saj të vogël, ndërsa i tregon atij histori nga Perëndimi i Vjetër. Por përrallat me aventurat e harruara, bëhen tepër reale kur një i huaj shfaqet në kërkim të një thesari të humbur.
programme.category: Uestern

programme.title: Një superhero pa superfuqi
programme.desc: Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Nicolas Cage, Chloë Grace Moretz. Edhe pse nuk ka asnjë lloj superfuqie, një adoleshent vishet si superhero dhe bashkë me një vajzë dhe babain e saj, fillojnë luftën kundër një bande kriminale.
programme.category: Aksion
komedi

programme.title: Mbreti Majmun 3
programme.desc: Aaron Kwok. Mbreti Majmun dhe shkokët e tij kapen robër nga mbretëresha e një vendi që popullohet vetëm nga femra, e cila beson se prania e udhëtarëve paralajmëron shkatërrimin e botës së tyre.
programme.category: Aksion
fantazi

programme.title: Sfiduesi
programme.desc: Kur vihet në kurth për vrasjen e Udhëheqësit Sovran të Botës së Re, një ushtar i ri duhet të zgjedhë nëse do të vazhdojë t'i qëndrojë besnik ideologjisë së pushtetit, apo t'i bashkohet grupit të sfiduesve.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Paç fat!
programme.desc: Laki dhe Rafael kanë jetuar gjithmonë në anën e gabuar të ligjit. Kur një punë shkon shumë keq, Laki e gjen veten në borxh ndaj te fortëve te zonës. Ai detyrohet që bashkë me vëllane, të bejnë goditjen më të madhe në karrierën e tyre.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Lufta e yjeve III
programme.desc: Shumë kohë më parë, në një galaktikë shumë të largët nisi nje sagë e mbushur me luftra yjore me xhedaj të të mirës dhe një i zgjedhur i cili do të zbulojë anën e tij më të errët. Saga yjore do të mbyllet me Hakmarrjen e Sithit.
programme.category: Hakmarrja e Sithit

programme.title: Plan i blinduar
programme.desc: Columbus Short, Matt Dillon, Laurence Fishburne. Një ekip rojesh kamionësh te blinduar që transportojnë para, tentojnë të vjedhin kompaninë ku punojnë. Por shumë shpejt plani i tyre në dukje i pagabueshëm merr një kthesë vdekjeprurëse.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Bërthama e Tokës
programme.desc: Hilary Swank, Aaron Eckhart. Kur bërthama e Tokës, ndalon së rrotulluari, një grup shkencëtarësh nisen për në qendër të saj me qëllim që të shpëthejnë një mekanizëm bëthamor dhe të rikthejnë gjithçka në normalitet.
programme.category: Fantashkencë

programme.title: Në dashuri dhe në luftë
programme.desc: S.Bullock, C.O'Donnell. Ernest Heminguej, reporteri që përjetoi luftën e parë botërore, shkrimtari që u dashurua marrëzisht me një infermiere. Një histori mbi kurajon në kohë frike. Një histori e vërtetë dashurie në kohë lufte.
programme.category: Regjia: Richard Attenborough

programme.title: Indiani më i shpejtë në botë
programme.desc: A. Hopkins. Kjo është historia e vërtetë e njuzelandezit Burt Munro, i cili harxhoi vite të tëra, për të rindërtuar një motoçikletë indiane të vitit 1920, me dëshirën për të garuar në kampionatin boteror të motoçiklizmit në Utah.
programme.category: Drame

programme.title: Vrarë nga dashuria
programme.desc: Një vajzë e verbër, bie në dashuri me një djalë që punon si guidë turistike dhe duket sikur përmes tij, ajo mund të shohë botën. Por asgjë nuk është si duket dhe ai fsheh një sekret të errët, që mund t'i ndajë përgjithmonë.
programme.category: Një histori Indie

programme.title: Lufta
programme.desc: Kevin Costner. Stiven kthehet ne shtepi pas luftes ne Vietnam. Teksa ai perpiqet te sheroje plaget psiko-emotive, djali dhe vajza e tij grinden me femijet e tjere per shkak te nje shtepie qe po tentojne te ndertojne maje nje peme.
programme.category: Drame

programme.title: Dëgjoje zërin tim
programme.desc: Një trajnere zëri, përballet me shumë vështirësi për t'u futur në industrinë e leximit të zërave të mbizotëruar nga meshkujt, e për më tepër konkurrentët e saj kryesorë janë i ati sëbashku me nxënësin e tij më të mirë...
programme.category: Lake Bell

programme.title: Babai më i mirë në botë
programme.desc: Robin Williams në rolin e vështirë e të vlerësuar nga kritika të një babai beqar, profesor letërsie në universitet, që ëndërron të bëhet shkrimtar i famshëm, dhe tenton më kot të krijojë një lidhje me djalin e tij të shfazuar 15 vjeçar.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Udhëtim drejt vetes
programme.desc: Vinsenti vuan nga sindroma Tourete. Pas vdekjes së të ëmës, i ati e shtron në një klinikë, ku lidh miqësi me dy pacientë. Por ai i ka bërë të ëmës një premtim, ndaj bashkë me miqtë e rinj, nisë një udhëtim që do t'ia ndryshojë jetën.
programme.category: Dramë
aventurë

programme.title: Dikur dhe tani
programme.desc: Bazuar në histori të vërtetë. Dy vëllezër jetojnë me stresin e një babai abuziv dhe shpëtimi i vetëm për ta bëhet pasioni për sportin dhe mbështetja tek një grup miqsh në momentet e trazuara.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Binjakë përjetë
programme.desc: Kristen Wiig, Bill Hader. Pas një tentative vetëvrasjeje të dështuar në të njëjtën ditë, vëlla e motër binjakë që s'fisnin prej kohësh, detyrohen të lënë mënjanë inatet e vjetra dhe të riparojnë marrëdhënien e tyre...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Shkruar dashuri në krahët e saj
programme.desc: Kat Dennings, Chad M.Murray. Bazuar ne një histori të vërtetë, që filloi një lëvizje globale! Një vajzë adoleshente e varur nga droga gjen forcën të futet në rrugën e rikuperimit edhe krijon një fondacion që ka ndihmuar mijëra njerëz...
programme.category: Biografi
dramë

programme.title: Sulm ndaj të vërtetës
programme.desc: Woody Harrelson, James Marsden, Rob Reiner. Historia e vërtetë e një grupi gazetarësh që zbuluan të vërtetën që fshihej pas justifikimeve të presidentit Bush për fillimin e luftës në Irak, në 2003-shin.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Zgjidh rrugën tënde
programme.desc: 2019. Ethan Hawke. Pasi ka kaluar pjesën më të madhe të jetës në burg për krime të vogla, një ish i dënuar has vështirësi të përshtatet me botën jashtë hekurave. Jeta e tij merr tjetër kuptim kur gjen një foshnje të braktisur.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Pesha e një ëndrre
programme.desc: Një aktore dikur e famshme në filmat komercialë, përpiqet dëshpërimisht të mbijetojë në biznesin e kinemasë. Pranë të 40-tave dhe me një karrierë në rënie, ajo lufton pa u dorëzuar për të fituar role të reja, por me çfarë kostoje?
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Udhëtim i pakohë
programme.desc: Breann Johnson, Glen Powell. Rrugëtimi në jetë i një jetimi, i cili mëson të përballet me keqdashjen e njerëzve dhe lejon dashurinë që të gjejë zemrën e tij.
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Emri im është Khan
programme.desc: Prodhim i vitit 2010. Shah Rukh Khan, Kajol. Një njeri me probleme autizmi, ndërmerr një udhëtim të jashtëzakonshëm, në emër të dashurisë dhe dinjitetit, duke frymëzuar miliona njerëz.
programme.category: Një histori Indie

programme.title: Ulkonjat e shemtuara
programme.desc: Nje vajze e re largohet nga qyteti i saj i vogel dhe shkon ne Nju Jork, me endrren per te nisur nje karriere muzikore. Por jeta ne qytet eshte me e veshtire nga ç'e kish imagjinuar. Ajo nis pune ne nje lokal te zhurmshem te quajtur Ulkonjat .
programme.category: Romancë

programme.title: Zogu i bardhë në stuhi dëbore
programme.desc: Shailene Woodley, Eva Green. Një 17 vjeçare, jeton ne maksimum aventurat e moshës dhe seksualitetin e sapozbuluar. Por kur nëna e saj, një grua shtëpiake, në dukje perfekte, zhduket, jeta e adoleshentes do të ndryshojë rrënjësisht...
programme.category: Dramë
thriller

programme.title: Laguna blu: Rizgjimi
programme.desc: Indiana Evans, Brenton Thwaites. Dy të rinj adoleshentë bien në dashuri, ndërkohë që mbështeten tek njëri-tjetri për të mbijetuar në një ishull të pabanuar tropikal...
programme.category: Romancë

programme.title: O tani, o kurrë
programme.desc: Dakota Fanning, Josef Altin. Një adoleshente e diagnostikuar me një sëmundje të pashërueshme harton një listë me gjërat që do të bëjë përpara se të vdesë. Në krye të listës është dëshira për të humbur virgjërinë...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: E bukur dhe e çmendur
programme.desc: Rob Lowe, Paz Vega. Bazuar në një histori tronditëse dhe të vërtetë. Pas vrasjes brutale të Ben Novack, një trashëgimtari të pasur hotelesh, hetimi i policisë fokusohet tek bashkëshortja e tij...
programme.category: Histori e vërtetë

programme.title: Fuqia e një kampioni
programme.desc: Miles Teller, Aaron Eckhart. Historia e vërtetë e kampionit të boksit Vini Pazienza, i cili pas një aksidenti me makinë ku doktorët nuk i dhanë shpresa për të ecur sërish, ai bëri një nga rikthimet më të jashtëzakonshme.
programme.category: Biografi
sport

programme.title: Pas Cak
programme.desc: Ndiqni prapa skenave te xhirimeve te filmit.
programme.category: Outlander

programme.title: Klasa e tetë
programme.desc: 13 vjeçarja e turpshme Kajla përpiqet të përballojë edhe javën e fundit presionin e shkollës 8-vjeçare, ndërkohë që bën video me këshilla 'si të jesh vetvetja' dhe i poston në kanalin e saj të youtube-it, pa asnjë shikueshmëri...
programme.category: Komedi
dramë

programme.title: Kështjella prej xhami
programme.desc: Fituesja e çmimit Oskar Brie Larson, Woody Harrelson. Bazuar në jetëshkrimin bestseller të Jeannette Walls, vjen një kronikë e aventurave të një familjeje aspak normale, por që kanë për njr -tj një dashuri pa kushte..
programme.category: Biografi
dramë

programme.title: Zbërthimi

programme.category: Biografi/Luftë

programme.title: Sërish adoleshente

programme.category: Komedi
fantazi

aksion

programme.title: Një fundjavë pa internet
programme.desc: 2018. Fabrizio Bentivoglio. Një shkrimtar me emër dhe armik publik i internetit, me rastin e ditëlindjes mbledh familjen në shtëpinë e tij në mal. Kur grupi mbetet befasisht pa linjë interneti, të gjithë i kap paniku dhe pasojat do te jenë të paparas.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Ofelia

programme.category: Dramë
romancë

programme.title: Banda e rebelëve

programme.category: Komedi
aventurë

programme.title: Mr. Bean, pjesët më të mira
programme.desc: Rowan Atkinson, në rolin e tij më të pëlqyer nga publiku. Jeta për Mr. Bean, është një sfidë dhe kudo ku ai shkon gjithçka kthehet përmbys. E megjithë këto, falë këmbënguljes së tij, ai gjithmonë gjen një zgjidhje...
programme.category: Serial komik

programme.category: Parodi

programme.title: Udhëtimi i fundit për Las Vega
programme.desc: Robert De Niro, Michael Douglas, Morgan Freeman, Kevin Kline. Katër miq të ngushtë në fund të 60-tave vendosin të dalin nga pensioni dhe të bëjnë një festë beqarie për të vetmin prej tyre qe kishte mbetur beqar.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Çdo ditë nga e para
programme.desc: Historia e nje meteorologu i cili pas nje stuhie ka ngecur ne diten me te keqe te jetes se tij. Fillimisht duket disi i shqetesuar, por me pas fillon te zbuloje se çdo te thote te jetosh jeten kur e nesermja s'ekziston.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Të largosh një djalë në 10 dite
programme.desc: K Hudson, M McConaughey. Një gazetare që duhet të shkruajë një artikull si mund të largosh një djalë për 10 ditë, takon një të ri, i cili ka vënë bast se mund të bëjë çdo vajzë të dashurohet brenda 10 ditësh. Kush mund të fitojë?!
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Në luftë për dashurinë
programme.desc: Nju Jork, 1943. Arturo duhet të kthehet në atdhe për të ndaluar që e dashura e tij të martohet me djalin e një bosi mafie. Ndaj, ai bashkohet me radhët e ushtrisë amerikane, e cila po përgatitet të zbarkojë në Siçili...
programme.category: Komedi
romancë

programme.title: Në mbrojtje të dëshmitarit
programme.desc: Tyler Perry, Eugene Levy. Pasi futet në programin e mbrojtjes së dëshmitarëve, një banker i Wall Street-it, dërgohet për t'u strehuar në shtëpinë e Madeas, gruas me karakter të fortë që vendos rregull sipas mënyrave të saj të veçanta.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Kjo është luftë!
programme.desc: Reese Witherspoon, Chris Pine, Tom Hardy. Dy agjentët më të mirë të C.I.A-s, janë edhe shokë të pandarë. Por miqësia e tyre do të vihet në provë kur ata bien në dashuri me të njëjtën vajzë.
programme.category: Komedi
romancë

programme.title: Dua jetën tënde

programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Quo vado?

programme.category: Komedi

programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Makina lufte
programme.desc: Brad Pitt, Ben Kingsley. Kur një gjeneral krenar ngarkohet të përfundojë me qetësi një luftë 8-vjeçare që nuk gëzon përkrahje popullore, ai vendos të bëjë mision të tij fitimin e luftës, por nuk dyshon se mendjemadhësia mund të jetë armiku i tij më i keq.
programme.category: Komedi
luftë

programme.desc: Paolo Villaggio. Për të mos humbur vendin e punës, Sergio Colombo një burrë 40 e ca vjeç regjistrohet në një kurs në Angli për të mësuar gjuhën. Por në moshën e tij, mësimi i një gjuhe tjetër është një mision pothuajse i pamundur...
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Junior

programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Shtëpi, e ëmbla shtëpi
programme.desc: Ata janë një çift në kërkim të një shtepie, por çmimet e shtrenjta janë të papërballueshme për ta...derisa takojne 1 plakë qe u shet shtepine e saj...me nje çmim qesharak. Vetëm se ka një kleçkë. Sapo vë kemben brenda, shtëpia fillon të shperbehet.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Evani i Gjithëpushtetshëm
programme.desc: Steve Carell, Morgan Freeman. Një kongresmen i sapo zgjedhur përballet me një detyrë me përmasa biblike. Për t'i bërë ballë një përmbytjeje, Zoti e ka urdhëruar të ndërtojë një varkë gjigante druri dhe të fusë në të sa më shumë kafshë...
programme.category: Komedi
fantazi

programme.title: Kafazi
programme.desc: Ata janë një çift i përkryer... homoseksualesh, që bashkejetojne prej 20 vjetesh. Tani, djali i tyre është dashuruar me vajzën e një senatori ultrakonservator dhe kërkon të martohet. Kur këto dy familje të takohen, çdo gjë mund të ndodhe...

programme.title: Verë, gjeldeti dhe miq

dramë

programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Deti i pemëve

programme.category: Thriller
mister

programme.desc: Robert Redford, Helen Mirren, William Dafoe. Ata janë çifti ideal. Kanë një biznes të suksesshem, jetojnë në periferine e qete, kanë dy femije të rritur dhe kjo ëndërr e bukur do te vazhdonte keshtu deri diten kur Ueini rrëmbehet!
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Shtëpia në fund të rrugës
programme.desc: J.Lawrence. Një nënë dhe vajza e saj që sapo janë zhvendosur në një qytezë, jetojnë pranë një shtëpie ku vite më parë një çift u masakrua nga e bija. Por kur miqësohen me djalin e mbijetuar të familjes, kuptojnë se tmerri jeton ende...
programme.category: Thriller psikologjik

programme.title: Gjueti në shkretëtirë
programme.desc: 2014. Michael Douglas, Jeremy Irvine. Pa rroba dhe i pa armatosur, nje udhërrëfyes përpiqet t'i shpëtojë një biznesmeni të pashpirt, i cili kërkon që heshtjen e tij për një aksident tragjik ta sigurojë duke e torturuar nëpër shkretëtirën e pafalshme.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Xhasper Xhons
programme.desc: Levi Miller. Toni Collette. Bazuar në romanin e famshëm australian. Jeta e 14- vjeçarit Çarli do të ndryshojë përgjithmonë natën kur Xhasper Xhonsi, një djalosh me race të perzier, do të trokasë në dritaren e tij.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Kulla

programme.title: Hija e djallit
programme.desc: Harrison Ford, Brad Pitt. Historia e nje irlandezi qe pranohet ne familjen e nje amerikani si nje mik i besuar. Por diçka ne te kaluaren e tij te erret do te sjelle gjemen ne shtepi.
programme.category: Krim
thriller

programme.title: Rrethi i Kolombit
programme.desc: Selma Blair, Amy Smart. Trashëgimtarja e nje pasurie marramendëse e cila nuk del nga shtëpia prej vitesh, duhet të përballet me frikërat, kur fqinja e saj vdes dhe hetuesit e vrasjes, kërkojnë ti bëjnë një sërë pyetjesh...
programme.category: Krim
thriller

programme.title: I pathyeshmi
programme.desc: 2000. Bruce Willis, Samuel L. Jackson. Filmi i parë i trilogjisë "Unbreakable". Një njeri i zakonshëm mëson diçka të jashtëzakonshme për veten pas një aksidenti me tren, ku humbasin jetën të gjithë përveç tij.
programme.category: Thriller
mister

programme.title: Rruga e frikës: pjesa 1 - 1994
programme.desc: Filmi i parë i trilogjisë "Fear street", bazuar në serinë e librave me të njëjtin titull. Pas një varg vrasjesh brutale në qytezën Shadyside, një grup adoleshentësh ndeshen aksidentalisht me një fuqi të ligë shekullore, që torturon zonën e tyre prej më sh.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Kurthi vdekjeprurës
programme.desc: 2017. Adrien Brody, John Malkovich, Antonio Banderas. Pas një vjedhjeje të guximshme, tre kriminelë në arrati mbyllen brenda një magazine me shpresën për t'ju larguar policisë, por atje brenda do të gjejnë një rrezik edhe më të madh.
programme.category: Thriller
krim

programme.title: Shteti i kuq
programme.desc: Michael Parks, Melissa Leo, John Goodman. Një grup adoleshentësh, marrin një ftesë misterioze me premtimin se do të organizohet një festë e çmendur, por me të mbërritur kuptojnë se ky do të jetë makthi më i madh i jetës së tyre.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Prometeu
programme.desc: N.Rapace, M.Fassbender, Ch.Theron. Nga regjisori Ridley Scott, vjen një film fantashkencë i papërsëritshëm. Nje grup shkencëtarësh zbulojnë disa shpella me të dhëna që mund të tregojnë zanafillën e njerëzimit. Por cfarë fshihet pas tyre?
programme.category: Mister
fantashkencë

programme.title: Me çdo kusht
programme.desc: Idris Elba, Beyoncé Knowles, Ali Larter. Një menaxher i suksesshëm dhe i lumtur në martesën e tij, fillon të persekutohet nga një kolege pune, duke vënë në rrezik gjithçka për të cilën ai ka punuar aq shumë.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: U-571
programme.desc: M.McConaughey. Nëndetëset gjermane po bëjnë kërdinë në Atlantikun verior. Çelësi i fitores është në duart e 9 burrave. Do të hiqen si gjermanë dhe do të futen në një nga nëndetëset e armikut për të marrë makinën e deshifrimit të kodeve.
programme.category: Film historik

programme.title: Raporti i Pakicës
programme.desc: Regjia: Steven Spielberg. Tom Cruise, Colin Farrell. Në të ardhmen, një program që zbulon krimet para se të ndodhin, identifikon një nga oficerët më të mirë si personin e rradhës dhe ai duhet të marrë arratinë dhe të zbulojë të vërtetën..

fantashkencë

programme.title: Kohë të trazuara
programme.desc: Jon Voight, Teri Polo. Një detektiv bashkëpunon me një person telepatik per të gjetur një fëmijë të humbur.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Instinkt
programme.desc: 1999. Një thriller psikologjik me Anthony Hopkins dhe Cuba Gooding Jr të dy fitues të çmimin oskar. Misteret e një psikiatri që kërkon të lexojë mendimet e një njeriu që ka jetuar për vite të tëra në xhungël i veçuar nga bota.
programme.category: Thriller psikologjik

programme.title: The Empty Man

programme.desc: The Empty Man: Directed by David Prior. With James Badge Dale, Marin Ireland, Sasha Frolova, Samantha Logan. programme.title: Water for Elephants
Voda za slonove
programme.desc:
Water for Elephants: Directed by Francis Lawrence. With Reese Witherspoon, Robert Pattinson, Christoph Waltz, Paul Schneider. Set in the 1930s, a former veterinary student takes a job in a travelling circus and falls in love with the ringmaster's wife." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1067583/","name":"Water for Elephants","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQzMDU3NDEwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTI3MDU0NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in the 1930s, a former veterinary student takes a job in a travelling circus and falls in love with the ringmaster's wife.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1067583/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"catarinaloss"},"dateCreated":"2011-04-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"One Spectacular Show","reviewBody":"Readers, fear not. This is one adaption that lives up to the book.

Water for Elephants is pure beauty. Despite the fact that it takes place during the Depression, it makes you almost wish you lived during the '30s.

One reason is the costumes. They are wonderfully done, as well as the makeup. Another is the eye candy. No, I'm not talking about Robert Pattinson(though he looks as gorgeous as ever). I'm talking about the breathtaking cinematography, courtesy of Rodrigo Prieto.

While the leads(Robert Pattinson, Reese Witherspoon, Christoph Waltz) all turn in GREAT performances, the real star here is Tai the elephant. She plays Rosie, the newest addition to The Benzini Bros. Most Spectacular Show on Earth, who is brought in in hopes of taking The Benzini Bros. circus to a new level(particularly to the level of Ringling Bros.).

As per usual, there are quite a few changes that may or may not irritate the readers. It all depends on the person. One that I felt was an improvement upon the book, however, was the combining of August and Uncle Al. I honestly didn't miss Al one bit.

Water for Elephants is a beautiful, enchanting, mesmerizing must-see.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":114198,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2011-04-22","keywords":"animal abuse,circus,elephant,ringmaster,train","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2: Water for Elephants","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1397594649","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA0MzA4MjYxOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzc1NTYzNTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA0MzA4MjYxOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzc1NTYzNTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A veterinary student (Robert Pattinson) abandons his studies after his parents are killed and joins a traveling circus as their vet, where he meets animal trainer August (Christoph Waltz) and his wife Marlena (Reese Witherspoon)."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1500155/","name":"Robert Pattinson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000702/","name":"Reese Witherspoon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0910607/","name":"Christoph Waltz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1349376/","name":"Francis Lawrence"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017497/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070636/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0177280/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0481418/","name":"Richard LaGravenese"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2717485/","name":"Sara Gruen"}],"duration":"PT2H2M"}</script><metacontent="

Two elven brothers embark on a quest to bring their father back for one day." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7146812/","name":"Onward","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTZlYzk3NzQtMmViYS00YWZmLTk5ZTEtNWE0NGVjM2MzYWU1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDg4NjY5OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two elven brothers embark on a quest to bring their father back for one day.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7146812/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"loginibisheart"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Age doesn't matter, watch this movie!","reviewBody":"It's a fantastic movie! It might fall into cliches but that's what the movie is all about. It brings the sense of epic to the viewer and engage with their feelings. It's well balanced, as the movie emphasizes in the adventure aspect of it but without forgetting comic times as well as really touchy moments were you'll for sure be moved. It's a great movies that will introduce you to some aspects of role playing in a way you probably haven't thought before. programme.title: Arrival
Dolazak
programme.desc: Arrival: Directed by Denis Villeneuve. With Amy Adams, Jeremy Renner, Forest Whitaker, Michael Stuhlbarg. A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2543164/","name":"Arrival","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTExMzU0ODcxNDheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDE1OTI4MzAy._V1_.jpg","description":"A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2543164/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"SilentEyes_"},"dateCreated":"2017-02-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"No CGI overkill, just some fine acting and directing","reviewBody":"Denis Villeneuve is without a doubt an upcoming director and I can't wait to see Blade Runner 2049. Prisoners, Sicario and now Arrival (haven't seen Enemy yet, or some of his earlier work). Denis knows how to capture the tension. It is almost the strongest point of all of his films. Minimal use of computer generated images, and main focus on story, characters, acting and thrilling scenes. Back on IMDb board, I have noticed a lot of people calling Arrival a boring movie. So many hypocrites these days. People trying to point out every possible flaw to look and sound smarter while at the same time hailing far worse movies. Calling it boring and slow while at the same time complaining no originality in Hollywood, only giant CGI laser explosions extravaganza. Go watch Independence Day. In Arrival there is no action, no explosions, just some amazing acting performances combined with good directing, editing and cinematography. IMDb data; ttnr: 2543164, Title: Arrival, --- Description: Arrival: Directed by Denis Villeneuve. With Amy Adams, Jeremy Renner, Forest Whitaker, Michael Stuhlbarg. A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2543164/","name":"Arrival","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTExMzU0ODcxNDheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDE1OTI4MzAy._V1_.jpg","description":"A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2543164/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"SilentEyes_","dateCreated":"2017-02-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"No CGI overkill, just some fine acting and directing","reviewBody":"Denis Villeneuve is without a doubt an upcoming director and I can't wait to see Blade Runner 2049. Prisoners, Sicario and now Arrival (haven't seen Enemy yet, or some of his earlier work). Denis knows how to capture the tension. It is almost the strongest point of all of his films. Minimal use of computer generated images, and main focus on story, characters, acting and thrilling scenes. Back on IMDb board, I have noticed a lot of people calling Arrival a boring movie. So many hypocrites these days. People trying to point out every possible flaw to look and sound smarter while at the same time hailing far worse movies. Calling it boring and slow while at the same time complaining no originality in Hollywood, only giant CGI laser explosions extravaganza. Go watch Independence Day. In Arrival there is no action, no explosions, just some amazing acting performances combined with good directing, editing and cinematography. There was not a single moment I felt bored.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":647859,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2016-11-11","keywords":"alien contact,linguistics,linguist,nonlinear timeline,based on short story","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Final Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4225807897","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzA4Mzg5OTY5Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDk4ODg0MDI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzA4Mzg5OTY5Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDk4ODg0MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A linguist is recruited by the military to assist in translating alien communications.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0010736/","name":"Amy Adams","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0719637/","name":"Jeremy Renner","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001845/","name":"Forest Whitaker"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0898288/","name":"Denis Villeneuve"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0296971/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0251858/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0158853/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2104063/","name":"Eric Heisserer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5384213/","name":"Ted Chiang"],"duration":"PT1H56M"</script><metacontent="
